subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical ruler established Rajasthan as a state?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राज्य को किस इतिहासिक सर ने स्थापित किया।
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is famously known as the historical ruler who established the city of Jaipur, which later became the foundation of the Rajasthan state.

explanation_en:
Pratap Singh Parihar, also known as Pratap Singh Parihar, was the historical ruler who established the city of Jaipur and later became the capital of Rajasthan, thus making him the founder of the state.
The correct answer is A.
